name: Birdfight
description:
Birdfight is a Joust-like last-man-standing game. There's no point system or waves of enemies. Just kill everyone else and you win.

Controls

Birdfight was designed for the arcade (in fact, we're happy to sell you a Birdfight arcade machine), but you should be just fine playing with most gamepads. We also added keyboard support because it makes development easier. Two people can play on the same keyboard comfortably. It's a bit cramped for 3 or 4.

  • Player 1: WASD + Space
  • Player 2: Arrows + Return
  • Player 3: TFGH + B
  • Player 4: IJKL + Comma

In Development

  • Online multiplayer
  • More stages and characters
  • Single-player mode

Credits

  • Nolan Baker - Code
  • Rob Chandler - Art
  • Nate Treme - Sound
